title: Classic T-Shirt
description: A timeless classic t-shirt made from 100% premium cotton. Perfect for everyday wear, casual outings, and comfortable lounging. Features a comfortable fit and breathable fabric.

title: Summer Dress
description: Light and breezy summer dress perfect for warm days. Made from soft, breathable cotton blend. Features a flattering silhouette and elegant design ideal for beach trips and casual gatherings.

title: Running Shoes
description: Professional running shoes with advanced cushioning technology for maximum comfort. Features lightweight design, breathable mesh, and superior grip for all terrains.

title: Leather Handbag
description: Elegant leather handbag crafted from premium Italian leather. Spacious interior with multiple compartments, durable handles, and timeless design. Perfect for work and social occasions.

title: Unisex Hoodie
description: Comfortable unisex hoodie made from soft cotton blend fabric. Features kangaroo pocket, adjustable drawstrings, and is perfect for layering or wearing solo.
